basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science: Data Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii. I expect to graduate in Fall, 2027.

education.institution: Pearl Harbor Naval Shipyard Training Facility

Biblical and Theological Studies (Graduated Summa Cum Laude)
Certificate of Completion - Sonar Systems, Oceanography and Sonar

experience.summary: Deenergize, depressurize, drain and isolate high energy systems in United States Submarines to ensure the safety of shipyard personnel
highlights: Leads testing and troubleshooting hardware components and systems, including preparing, maintaining, and upholding procedures for logging, reporting, and statistically monitoring of submarine systems.
Accurately documents instances of hardware failure, repair, installation, and removal.
Supports development and implementation of new projects and new hardware installations, including servers, electrical panels, etc.
Installs, configures, tests, maintains, monitors, and troubleshoots new technological hardware and supports interconnected networking systems.

Performs on-site analysis, diagnosis, and resolution of complex mechanical and electrical problems for core projects, and recommends and implements corrective solutions, including off-site repair as needed.
Facilitates successful engineering and mechanical processes (depressurizing, de-energizing, dewatering, and lockout/tagouts) to ensure critical safety of workforce and multi-million dollar equipment.

experience.summary: Install solar pannels and associated systems.
highlights: Trained under master electrician across public and private spaces to identify, analyze, troubleshoot, and assist with repairs of equipment and electrical faults.
Interpreted blueprints, schematics, and completed electrical installations while carrying out various maintenance duties.
Communicated with clients in a professional, courteous manner at all times.
Collaborated with construction workers, roofers, and other crew members.

experience.summary: Facilitated successful engineering and mechanical processes to ensure critical safety of workforce and multi-million dollar equipment.
highlights: Successfully managed and deployed the administration of 4,000+ submarine systems standards of operation and procedures.
Coordinated essential maintenance jobs with cross-functional leadership teams and workforce to ensure successful completion of projects.
Mentored and developed two dozen personnel to gain required competencies to enhance multiple cross-functional projects, resulting in successful maintenance and long-term success.

experience.summary: Ensure the safe operation and navigation of the submarine utilizing the onboard Sonar equipment
highlights: Maintain, repair, calibrate, tune and adjust all electronic equipment used for underwater surveillance and scientific data collection.
Support operation and basic maintenance of underwater surveillance and scientific data collection systems.
Perform organizational and intermediate level maintenance on underwater surveillance and scientific data collection systems, equipment and associated combat control systems test equipment.
Operate & test underwater surveillance and scientific data collection systems.

volunteer.summary: Assist the youth pastor in running youth group
